name: Springans Brothers
effectText: If this card is sent from the hand or Deck to the GY: You can target 1 "Springans" monster in your GY, except "Springans Brothers"; Special Summon it in Defense Position. If this card is in your hand, field, or GY: You can target 1 "Springans" Xyz Monster you control; attach this card to it as material. You can only use each effect of "Springans Brothers" once per turn.
